text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WHAT YOU MEANT TO SAY: The economic recovery of @POTUS44 after the Great Recession was destroyed by @realDonaldTrump when he lied about & ignored the #COVID19 pandemic & failed to act until it was too late. 40,800,000 Americans are now out of work, & ALL job gains were destroyed.
